text:
Hi! We‚Äôre looking to hire a full-time Content Marketer at <http://Albacross.com|Albacross.com> - a revenue acceleration platform that provides B2B companies with demand and sales intelligence. This role would be based ideally in Stockholm but we‚Äôre open to remote working too.

This person would own the content strategy and roadmap as well as write various long and short form content including thought leadership posts, product stories, sales enablement materials, website copy, social and emails posts. Working closely with the Head of Growth, design, development, sales and product teams, this is a great opportunity to work in a cross-functional environment and to make a big impact on the company as a whole. If this sounds interesting or you know someone who would be a good fit, please drop me a message!
 <https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/2299505869>

text: I am, I applied for a content marketer role at Albacross about two years ago and I talked to the growth manager (Marcus) and the management (Viktor and others) as part of the hiring process. I was ‚Äúhired‚Äù and signed the contract for the role, only to be turned down the day I was supposed to start working because ‚ÄúThe CEO wasn‚Äôt convinced about my knowledge of SEO‚Äù. Essentially, I was ghosted by Albacross and Marcus Svensson ignored all of the messages that I sent him :slightly_smiling_face: I am sure that some things may have changed in the meantime, but I quit my job then to start working with Albacross and it was one of the biggest mistakes in my career
